我Medline search 完的確無直接關於multiple sexual partner 同miscarriage 嘅studies (ethics 上未必俾?)
A > B > C係滑唔滑坡係睇A > B 同B > C 嘅correlation 大唔大
我講嘅multiple sexual partner (A) > increased risk of sexually transmitted disease (B) > increased risk of miscarriage (C) 入面，B > C 我諗都唔駛多講，可以自己Google
至於A > B ，我係medline 是但 search :
exp Sexually Transmitted Diseases/
Unsafe Sex/
exp Sexual Partners/
exp Condoms/
exp Heterosexuality/
exp Risk-Taking/
1 and 2 and 3 and 4 and 5 and 6

結果有16 個result，篩選完關事嘅studies 都係話濫交嘅人高機會唔戴套

To investigate this issue, in-depth interviews were conducted with a diverse sample of heterosexual male and female participants from large metropolitan cities who had had unprotected vaginal or anal sex with at least two partners met online in the past 3 months. With few exceptions, participants relied on faulty strategies and heuristics to estimate these risks; yet, most engaged in unprotected sex at their first meeting or very soon afterward. (Sample size 有150 人)



This study was to investigate the prevalence of and factors associated with inconsistent condom use with regular female sex partners (RPs) among heterosexual male STD patients (MSTDPs) in China. We interviewed 413 MSTDPs who had had sex with at least one RP and had received a diagnosis within the past week to six months. The prevalence of inconsistent condom use with RPs was 42.9% since STD diagnosis.

Wang Z, Yang L, Jiang H, Huang S, Palmer AE, Ma L, Lau JTF. High Prevalence of Inconsistent Condom Use With Regular Female Sex Partners Among Heterosexual Male Sexually Transmitted Disease Patients in Southern China. J Sex Marital Ther. 2019;45(1):31-43. doi: 10.1080/0092623X.2018.1474408. Epub 2019 Jan 25. PMID: 29741446.

當然，我只係指increase in risk，而唔係指濫交＝流產，亦唔係指所有濫交嘅人流產都係因為濫交，事實上醫學嘅嘢大部份都係multi-factorial
